title: 2048 Number Puzzle Game
summary: 2048 ultimate game is a fun, addictive and a very simple puzzle game.
description: 2048 ultimate game is a fun, addictive and a very simple puzzle game.How to play 2048 game : Swipe in any direction and the tiles will move in that direction. When two tiles with the same number touch, they will sum up and merge into one for example when two tiles with number 4 touch they will merge and become 8. Get to the 2048 tile to win the game!2048 ultimate is an advance version of 2048 with many more features like you can choose different grid size like 4x4, 5x5, 6x6 etc. 2048 ultimate has four game modes like classic mode, survival mode, time mode and X-tile mode. Multiple skin type like numeric and alphabets. 2048 ultimate game gives you many different options to choose so that you never get bored. Download and enjoy this fun and addictive 2048 game.Our goal is to help users have an enjoyable experience when using our apps & games. It would be great if you download & play our 2048 Puzzle Game and write a review based on your experience with it.
descriptionHTML:
2048 ultimate game is a fun, addictive and a very simple puzzle game.

How to play 2048 game : Swipe in any direction and the tiles will move in that direction. When two tiles with the same number touch, they will sum up and merge into one for example when two tiles with number 4 touch they will merge and become 8. Get to the 2048 tile to win the game!

2048 ultimate is an advance version of 2048 with many more features like you can choose different grid size like 4x4, 5x5, 6x6 etc. 2048 ultimate has four game modes like classic mode, survival mode, time mode and X-tile mode. Multiple skin type like numeric and alphabets.
2048 ultimate game gives you many different options to choose so that you never get bored. Download and enjoy this fun and addictive 2048 game.

Our goal is to help users have an enjoyable experience when using our apps & games. It would be great if you download & play our 2048 Puzzle Game and write a review based on your experience with it.
